title: 08: The next iPhone, with Neil Cybart
description:
Apple's job is to make better iPhones so more people buy them faster. How does a tick, tock, tock design cycle, and removing the headphone jack fit into that? Gartenberg, Caldwell, Ritchie, and special guest Neil Cybart discuss.

Show notes

  • Apple Unlikely to Make Big Changes for Next iPhone
  • iPhone Warning Signs
  • We don't know jack about the next iPhone
  • iPhone 7 and making Lightning strike twice
  • Imagining an iPod in your ears
  • Tick-tock... tock?!â€”The future of iPhone product cycles
  • Above Avalon Memberships

Guests

  • Neil Cybart

Hosts

  • Michael Gartenberg
  • Serenity Caldwell
  • Rene Ritchie
